title: Client bugs and is late joining champ select unless my friends list is collapsed
body:
So, after installing the new update, I noticed a weird little bug.

I entered a game and I was really late into the champ select (I was banning, so I got a queue dodge penalty because I didn't ban in time).

I decided to make a post here, so I collapsed the friends list to join the practice tool (didn't want to queue up because dodging penalties) and lo and behold, friends list collapsed while recording, I entered normally. This seemed odd, but I didn't catch it. I left the practice tool and friends list was expanded. I tried to enter again and sure enough, I was late into champion selection.

I left, collapsed friends list, tried to enter again and instantly joined. I finally caught on to it and this wouldn't be a problem, except that by collapsing the friends list the client froze up for a bit.

Solutions tried: Restarting the computer, low-spec mode  and initiating a full repair. None worked.

Side Note problem: Why is it that my flex queue rank appears in custom games instead of Solo Q? 


Video Evidence:  (Client moved to the side so you can't see my friends' names. I am cool, but they may not be cool).
https://youtu.be/hmnTRJzN12M

replies.body: I've seen a few reports on this and would like to gather some more info on the issue.  Grab the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach it in a ticket so our tech team can dig into this problem.  While waiting for us to get back, a clean [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends)may help resolve this.  Thanks for the report and that video!
I am pretty sure since you saw this I won't have to send a ticket and give them even more work than what they already have, no?
Send a ticket if you have time.  We still need some more context from logs and you may also be asked some follow up questions as we continue to investigate this.  Thanks!
Alright, will do, I will also link the video and this board submission.
I have submitted the requested logs via ticket request #25662873
Received, thank you!  It's been sent up to our tech team, and a specialist will grab it as soon as possible.  :D
+1 having the same problem. Can't get into a game anymore. Left twice in champ select. Thank you for the waiting time. This new client is horrible if this occurs.
I'd like to help!  Are you getting any error messages, or can you go into more detail in regards to what is happening exactly?  Let me know!
Also had this problem. Purchased an i7 6700k and 1070 gpu two weeks ago and this happens as soon as patch comes out. League now manages to tilt me before I'm even in champ select xD

We're currently investigating this issue, so I'm not entirely sure what the culprit is.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach the logs it provides in a ticket.  We'd like to get more context and take a closer look.  Thanks for the report!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ZiBGWUjA,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-02-24T18:21:33.915+0000)
>
> We're currently investigating this issue, so I'm not entirely sure what the culprit is.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach the logs it provides in a ticket.  We'd like to get more context and take a closer look.  Thanks for the report!

I sent in a ticket with my logs from the hextech repair tool. Hope it helps!
Yup I am also having this issue while going into champion select. Same exact thing happens on my end as shown within the video

When you get a chance, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) along with some logs you can grab via our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  We've seen a few reports and want to investigate further. In the meantime a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) could work as a workaround.  Thanks for the report!
